alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 26 at 11:44AM PDT until March 29 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches between 6000 and 8000 feet. 1 to 2 feet of snow above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes including Whitney Portal and Aspendell. * WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 11 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Heavy snow will increase snow load on area rooftops and structures making them more prone to collapse.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
